<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The default (A-type) VSX FMA form kills the addend (it is taken from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the target register, which is then updated to reflect the result of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the FMA). If the instruction, however, kills one of the registers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// used for the product, then we can use the M-form instruction (which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will take that value from the to-be-defined register).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AltOpc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ppc/#a1545caeeda8de7bd87be034c59b2b9fe">PPC::getAltVSXFMAOpcode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AltOpc == -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass is run after register coalescing, and so we&#39;re looking for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a situation like this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %5 = COPY %9; VSLRC:%5,%9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %5&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDADP %5&lt;tied0&gt;, %17, %16,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%5,%17,%16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %9&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDADP %9&lt;tied0&gt;, %17, %19,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%9,%17,%19</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Where we can eliminate the copy by changing from the A-type to the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// M-type instruction. Specifically, for this example, this means:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %5&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDADP %5&lt;tied0&gt;, %17, %16,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%5,%17,%16</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is replaced by:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %16&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDMDP %16&lt;tied0&gt;, %18, %9,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//                         implicit %rm; VSLRC:%16,%18,%9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and we remove: %5 = COPY %9; VSLRC:%5,%9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> FMAIdx = <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-ppcvsxfmamutate-cpp-/ppcvsxfmamutate/#a30f67f9d69495342f90cadb071a87d53">LIS</a>-&gt;getInstructionIndex(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In theory, there could be other uses of the addend copy before this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fma.  We could deal with this, but that would require additional</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// logic below and I suspect it will not occur in any relevant</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// situations.  Additionally, check whether the copy source is killed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// prior to the fma.  In order to replace the addend here with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// source of the copy, it must still be live here.  We can&#39;t use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// interval testing for a physical register, so as long as we&#39;re</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// walking the MIs we may as well test liveness here.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: There is a case that occurs in practice, like this:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %9 = COPY %f1; VSSRC:%9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %6 = COPY %9; VSSRC:%6,%9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %7 = COPY %9; VSSRC:%7,%9</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %9&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDASP %9&lt;tied0&gt;, %1, %4; VSSRC:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %6&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDASP %6&lt;tied0&gt;, %1, %2; VSSRC:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %7&lt;def,tied1&gt; = XSMADDASP %7&lt;tied0&gt;, %1, %3; VSSRC:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which prevents an otherwise-profitable transformation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OtherUsers = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, KillsAddendSrc = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = std::prev(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>), JE = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a>(AddendMI);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">             J != JE; --J) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (J-&gt;modifiesRegister(AddendSrcReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">              J-&gt;killsRegister(AddendSrcReg, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The transformation doesn&#39;t work well with things like:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    %5 = A-form-op %5, %11, %5;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unless %11 is also a kill, so skip when it is not,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and check operand 3 to see it is also a kill to handle the case:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %5 = A-form-op %5, %5, %11;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// where %5 and %11 are both kills. This case would be skipped</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
